BLEConnectListener - Interface in com.advantech.bleeplib.utils
BLEConnectListener is a callback listener which will returns the connection results after you register a listener using the following method.
BLEDeviceBeanTimeoutCallback - Interface in com.advantech.bleeplib.utils
BLEDeviceBeanTimeoutCallback is a callback listener which returns the connection / task timeout results.
BLEImageWriteStatus - Enum in com.advantech.bleeplib.bean
An enum for image write status.
BLEScanListener - Interface in com.advantech.bleeplib.utils
BLEScanListener is a callback listener which will returns the scanning results after you register a listener using the following method.
BLETaskHandler - Class in com.advantech.bleeplib.utils
BLETaskHandler is an ready-to-use handler class that can assist user to do batch tasks for transmit image or firmware upgrade for more than one Advantech EPD devices at the same time.

New a BLETaskHandler constructor.
BLETaskHandlerCallback - Interface in com.advantech.bleeplib.utils
BLETaskHandlerCallback is a callback listener which will returns the task results.
BLEUtil - Class in com.advantech.bleeplib.utils
BLEUtil is a singleton class for basic bluetooth communication with Advantech EPD devices.
